name: geotalking
short_description:
We’d like to recruit members to make Geotalking. So if you are interested in the service, please contact me by ayokoyama.5.9@gmail.com. 
  Introduction: You can post a thread anywhere, and then you can start talking with a people about the place on Geotalking.
  Feature 1 : Anywhere
You can post a thread everywhere in the world, such as on the Pacific Ocean or the Antarctic Pole. 
  Feature 2 : Any range
If there is a thread posted at 280 Broadway Manhattan New York, which does the thread appeal to, a people all over the New York or just at 280 Broadway Manhattan? Namely, each thread must have their own range. On Getaoking, when you post a thread, if the googlemap scale is broad, the thread’s range becomes wide. And vice versa. 
  Feature 3 : Make your own Geotalking
You can also make your own Geotalking. For example, a community for "Good Chinese restaurants in New York", "Good fishing places in Vancouver island. Then put a link to your Geotalking on your facebook.
summary: geotalking is a googlemap-based new communication website
